sentences.en: All communications with the north have been stopped by snowstorm.
sentences.cn: 北部的一切交通均为暴风雪所阻.

sentences.en: Astronauts will make a final attempt today to rescue a communications satellite from its useless orbit.
sentences.cn: 今天宇航员将会做最后一次尝试，力图把一颗通信卫星从无效的轨道上抢救下来。

sentences.en: California is vying with other states to capture a piece of the growing communications market.
sentences.cn: 为了在日渐扩大的通讯市场分得一杯羹，加利福尼亚正在和其他州展开竞争。

sentences.en: Let us not forget that the much-maligned British Rail has a major expertise in electronic communications.
sentences.cn: 我们不要忘了备受非议的英国铁路在电子通讯领域有一项重要的技术专利。

sentences.en: Let's try to cripple their communications.
sentences.cn: 我们试着破坏他们的通讯设备吧。

sentences.en: Meanwhile we must do a good job in transport and communications.
sentences.cn: 同时我们要搞好交通运输工作.

sentences.en: She kept abreast with the flood of communications that had poured in.
sentences.cn: 她及时回复如雪片般飞来的大批信件.

sentences.en: The company produced circuitry for communications systems.
sentences.cn: 该公司为通信系统生产电路。

sentences.en: The prose of his official communications was so laboured, pompous and verbose.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的公文矫揉浮华，长篇大论。

sentences.en: The rocket launched two communications satellites.
sentences.cn: 火箭发射了两颗通信卫星。

sentences.en: The telephone communications were knocked out by the storm.
sentences.cn: 风暴使电话通讯中断了.

sentences.en: This ban on internal communications is generally referred to as'separation of functions. "
sentences.cn: 这种禁止内部联系的作法一般被称为是"职能的分立 ".

sentences.en: This would also cut communications with the threatened shores.
sentences.cn: 这样还可以切断与遭受威胁的沿海地区的联系.

sentences.en: Transport is difficult, communications are patchy.
sentences.cn: 交通困难，通信时断时续。

sentences.en: Transportation and communications are becoming easier day by day.

trans.tran_cn: 通信，交流( communication的名词复数 )，交际，信息，通信工具
trans.tran_en: Communications are the systems and processes that are used to communicate or broadcast information, especially by means of electricity or radio waves
